text: The Cat Concerto is the 29th Tom and Jerry animated cartoon. It was released in theaters on April 26, 1947 and was produced by Fred Quimby and directed by William Hanna and Joseph Barbera. It is considered one of the best Tom and Jerry cartoons ever made, winning the Academy Award for Best Short Subject: Cartoons in the 19th Academy Awards. ==References== == Other websites == * * Category:1947 movies Category:Academy Award winning movies Category:American movies Category:American musical movies Category:1940s comedy movies Category:Short movies
title: The Cat Concerto
